reviews.review: Garbage game, wish i didn't buy this trash.

It's really fun, nervous and exciting! In particular, the game server is very good, and the operation team is very helpful. It makes me have a great game experience. I won't suddenly drop the line or disconnect the game. It's a great game, and it's worth playing!

Alles an diesem Spiel ist unbalanced. 

Es wird nichts gefixed und cash-grab-artig jede neue Season ein weiterer Killer + Survivor ins Spiel geworfen, der die unfassbar hohe Anzahl an Perks und FÃ¤higkeiten noch weiter verwÃ¤ssert. 

Und was soll das mit dem Progression System? Ich habe hÃ¶chstens 10 Runden als Killer gespielt und schon 4 Killer auf max. Level 50. Die Devs schmeiÃŸen dir nur so Blutpunkte zum aufleveln in den Hals. Oh du hast heute eingeloggt? 100k Punkte!

Dieses Spiel ist nur weiterhin so beliebt, weil es bis jetzt noch keine vernÃ¼nftige Konkurrenz gibt.

I mean, it's alright I guess. Given me loads of fun for the product but also been in a horrible state for way too long, on the bright side! They are actually going to overhaul everything soon so y'know that's cool.

4/10 made me lose hope in mankind.

Update:

Garbage game.

The amount of perk meta that's basically required that comes from dlc which you need to buy or grind for months to get a character for perks that allow an extra hit is garbage. Did you want to be killer? You're gonna have to wait minutes to get in a game because survivors are slowly dwindling. This game lost half it's player base with comp mmr came out and they barely have done dog shit with it. Want my op? Don't get the fucking game, I used to think it was fun, but solo Q is garbage and it's only been made more apparent to a killer sided patch. Queing isn't fun, this game forces you to use perks just to counter-act tunneling which is just, godawful. Oh and if you do decide to get this game? Tough shit if you solo Q as survivor because Killers have been camping almost constantly in my games, believe me, I haven't faced this many camping killers in all my hours playing this game until REALLY recently.

Point is don't buy this game, it's shit.
fun game if you have friends :(

really fun game. SUPER FUN WITH FREINDS.

Great game to play with friends.

do not recommend unless you only want to have fun playing killer. game used to be fun, but over the years with each new update the devs took more and more from survivors and gave more and more to killers to the point where its unenjoyable to play as survivor. every game is catered to the killer, reworking most survivor perks to be useless finding gens or lockers while killers get perks to locate every survivor or instant down/kill them.
